<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command
</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Exec

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Multiplayer
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] if the code context is being remote executed from the JIP queue by [[remoteExec]] or [[remoteExecCall]] (when JIP param was set). It is a subset of [[isRemoteExecuted]]:
* Normal remote execution: 
** [[isRemoteExecuted]] - [[true]]
** [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]] - [[false]]
* Remote execution from JIP queue: 
** [[isRemoteExecuted]] - [[true]]
** [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]] - [[true]]
In SP always returns [[false]].
</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isRemoteExecutedJIP'''

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_remoteExecutedJIP = [[isRemoteExecutedJIP]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isRemoteExecuted]], [[remoteExec]], [[remoteExecCall]], [[canSuspend]], [[remoteExecutedOwner]], [[isUIContext]], [[isGamePaused]], [[isGameFocused]]
</value></part></template>
